annotations.description: Today we're presenting Eric Castro's very simple reconstruction of a classic Rum Runner Cocktail. The Rum Runner emerged around the same time as the original...
annotations.title: Quarantiki Featuring The Rum Runner

textContent:
1oz (30ml) White Rum
1oz (30ml) Jamaican Rum
1oz (30ml) Pineapple Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Simple Syrup
2 Dashes Peychaud's Bitters
Pineapple Frond,
Dehydrated Lemon/Lime Wheel Garnish

Whip shake and pour into pilsner or highball glass
Top with crushed ice and garnish with pineapple fronds ad dehydrated lemon/lime wheel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=li75VN8GGI0
title: The Rum Runner
